pr_title: [FLINK-16418][hive] Hide hive version to avoid user confuse

timeline.message: [FLINK-16418][hive] Hide hive version to avoid user confuse

timeline.bodyText: I don't think this one should be removed. It's there to verify the version provided by user takes precedence over the version detected in classpath.
timeline.author: lirui-apache
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -155,7 +155,6 @@ catalogs:
   - name: hivecatalog
     type: hive
     test: test
-    hive-version: 2.3.4
